Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by Mikala Egeblad, Chair and Theresa A. Guise, immediate Past-Chair of the AACR Tumor Microenvironment Working Group. The 2023 TME Town Hall will feature three presentations from young investigators in the tumor microenvironment community on the theme of “Tumor Macro-Environment: Mechanisms of Tumor-Body Interactions”. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session. Complimentary refreshments will be served.
SearchResultBody: TM08. Tumor-Body Interactions: Emerging Insights into the Interplay Between Tumor Micro- and Macroenvironments: A Tumor Microenvironment Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
Title: Tumor-Body Interactions: Emerging Insights into the Interplay Between Tumor Micro- and Macroenvironments: A Tumor Microenvironment Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
